content: easy stylish skinny leggings easy stylish skinny leggins materials knitting worsted #8 knitting needles gauge 5 sts and 5 row = 1 inch 2 54 cm first leg beg at cuff cast on 20 sts row 1-20 beg with a k row work even in st st k 1 row p 1 row row 21 k 1 increase k 16 sts increase k 1 22 sts row 22 p row 23 k row 24 p row 25 k 1 increase k 18 sts increase k 1 24 sts row 26 p row 27 k row 28 p row 29 k 1 increase k 20 sts increase k 1 26 sts row 30-35 beg with a p row work even in st st ending with a k row leg should measure 6 inches 15 24 cm break yarn and leave sts on a spare needle make 2nd leg the same leaving a long tail at cast-on for sewing up leg seam do not break yarn at end of last row to join legs row 36 p 26 sts across needle then 26 sts across sts on spare needle 52 sts now on needle row 37-52 beg with a k row work even in st st ending with a p row row 53 k 3 k 2 decrease across row end k 2 42 sts row 54-56 single rib k 1 p1 bind off loosely in rib break yarn leaving a length to sew up back seam sew leg and back seams this pattern is protected by copyright you may sell any patterns you make from this pattern but you may not sell the pattern itself nor claim it as your own copyright 2015 by bella blaubergs
